work.title: PROJECT DETAILS
work.description: In this full fledge project it contains 4pages for where in the 1st page Serachbar , location dropdown & meal type tiles appeared, on 2nd page it contains resturants with a filter box where user can search on their budget & on the 3rd page it contains  resturant details, after make the order in 4th page it shows the order details

testimonials.text: That Sthitapragyan must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresher an Under Graduate and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
